about_the_game:
Continue the Gone Upstate journey, now with your friends, further west into Big Sky Country. Settle the new land by collecting resources and building a base to support a persistent lifestyle on the modern frontier.

Big Sky Country

Completely rebuilt from the ground up in the latest Unreal Engine 5 to support multiplayer, smoother gameplay and advanced AI.

Survive

Maintain health, hunger, thirst and cold through crafting, farming and building.

Craft

Craft tools for efficient resource collection, buildings to keep warm and your items safe.

Defend

Mysterious entities from the sky will begin to notice the new settlement. Arriving in unidentified flying objects, defend your base with crafted weapons, guns and traps. Shoot your way through and gain the right to survive!

Continue the Gone Upstate journey, now with your friends, further west into Big Sky Country. Settle the new land by collecting resources and building a base to support a persistent lifestyle on the modern frontier.

Mysterious entities from the sky will begin to notice the new settlement. Arriving in unidentified flying objects, defend your base with crafted weapons, guns and traps. Shoot your way through and gain the right to survive!
name: Gone Upstate 2 : Big Sky Country

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 / AMD FX-9590 or better
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060
  • Additional Notes: SSD is highly recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 3060
  • Additional Notes: SSD is highly recommended

short_description: Gone Upstate 2 is a survival crafting sandbox game. Build a base to support co-op players or solo, then defend it against the mysterious entities from the sky.
